name: Pure Piano 2019
description:
There's no fast falling notes and tiles, reaction speed is not the key to play.

You can search and download 5000+ online songs with this piano APP.
All songs are FREE, needn't pay to unlock.

There are a lot of anime songs
There are a lot of pop songs
There are a lot of songs from movie
...

It's easy to play, less keys, slow notes.
It's also challenging, This piano won't play good sound if you press a wrong key, you will like it very much if you are piano or other instrument learner. You will get full hit rate report, it's designed to train your rythm feeling.

Features:
- This is a clean and lightweight free music game without paid items.
- It brings you the feeling of instrument player with an extremely simple piano with 5 keys.
- It's not only a piano but also a violin, flute, sax-phone, ocarina, guitar etc. You can play Tatanic with flute.

It will be actively updated from now on. More songs are being added.

Enjoy the cool interface and pure music and look forward your feedback： 5keypiano@gmail.com
